description: Renamed PULL_SENSOR_DATA to PULL with enhanced mode support for grid and points
changes: Renamed PULL_SENSOR_DATA function to PULL for simplicity
Added mode parameter: 'grid' for time intervals or 'points' for number of data points
Added modeValue parameter: grid interval (e.g., '15min') or number of points (e.g., 1000)
Default mode is 'points' with 1000 points for better user experience
Updated UI to support both grid and points modes with dynamic form fields
Enhanced function documentation with examples for both modes
Maintained backward compatibility with existing grid-based functionality
